name: SHOTGUN DISCO QUEEN
description:
SHOOT YOUR WAY TO THE TOP
TO BECOME THE
SHOTGUN DISCO QUEEN
  • smooth shotgun assasinations
  • disco action-stealth hybrid
  • three mesmerizing missions
  • sweet fat beats
  • psychedelic hand-drewn graphics

made in 72h with love for LD51 (theme: every 10 seconds)

you are a humble assasin with the shotgun as your weapon of choice
you are the lawful heir to the disco city throne
but an usurper king is ruling the city
take the matter in your own hands
blow away the competition
assasinate the false disco king
and finally become the fabled
DISCO QUEEN

  • movement: WASD or ↑↓←→
    shooting: will hapen with the beat
  • your objective: eliminate all targets and survive
  • every 10 seconds the disco and your situation will change
  • adapt and assasinate accordingly

GOOD LUCK AND PHAT BEATS
